ValidationRule.description: User should not go back to any previous stage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName == 'OPE_Program_Specification' , ISCHANGED(Stage__c), OR( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Stage__c), 'Not Proceeding'), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Stage__c), 'Complete'), AND( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Stage__c), 'Design'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, 'Idea' ), ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, 'Qualify' ), ISBLANK( TEXT( Stage__c ) ) ) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can't go back to previous stage.
